Errors¶

class stuy_utils.errors.StuyException(Exception)¶

Base exception class for StuyUtils.

class stuy_utils.errors.InvalidDate(StuyException)¶

Thrown if the input is not a date or datetime object.

class stuy_utils.errors.DayNotInData(StuyException)¶

Thrown if the inputted day is not in term_days.csv.
